title: The Pants Rotation
description:
Kirk says goodbye to his favorite pair of pants (00:07:00). The Ironhead Era is upon (00:14:00). Phil Mickelson couldn't have executed this Saudi Golf move any worse (00:31:25). Eric Trump wants to go to dinner with Jesus (00:39:10). It's 'Little Jack' time (00:50:00). Billboard Chart Guy is now BANNED from calling the show after Kirk listened to Kirkin' Off (01:17:30). Mike organizes more planted calls, Bernie Madoff chatter & more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
